In some of the Program modes the image quality is just fine, but in the quick point and shoot Auto action, and especially when using the zoom, image focus and sharpness were hit and miss. I have an older Panasonic Lumix (LZ3) which easily and reliably outperforms this pretty elph.If you have been wondering why the price keeps dropping, I suspect that is the reason.

Reviews.Title: Nice package
Reviews.Author: J. PARENT "jphotrod"
Reviews.Content: It is solidly built and compact. The zoom is fast and works well. Battery life is unknown but purchased a couple extras just in case (the battery is rechargeable but appears to be no bigger than a single AA battery).I was concerned about the "noise" comments and yes, there is a lot of it. If you zoom in on the camera itself the pictures look bad. If you look at them on your computer, at a normal resolution, they look fine. I think the camera isn't very granular with it's zoom ability of pictures taken and it brings you in very close - closer than you'd normally be looking at the photo. I compared the photo quality to my 500D and it's not a fair comparison (DSLR vs P&S;). Once I stopped comparing the photo quality and just accepted that this is a compact travel camera that will take decent pictures, I stopped worrying about photo quality so much.The microSD cards are TINY but just buy a big one and leave it in the camera (so you're not constantly swapping them out). Otherwise you will lose it in no-time.Update 1:Took the camera to Disney World for three days. Took about 75-100 pictures in all types of conditions. I didn't spend enough time to learn the manual settings (my fault--there are a lot of settings). I only had to swap out the battery once. The zoom was great and allowed me to get close to the animals and for those ride shots without having to resort to digital zoom or cropping. The recycle time in-between shots is a touch slower than I'd like but if you turn off photo preview (after taking a picture), it will respond faster. I haven't dissected the picture quality yet but will post an update when I do.Update 2:Actually took closer to 300 pictures on 1.5 batteries. Pretty good!I printed a bunch of pics out and the quality was great (4x6). Haven't printed out anything larger yet.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera - love it
Reviews.Author: Prashant Lad
Reviews.Content: The camera is awesome. I just love it. the size is very small and its very light. slips into my pocket and takes great pics. There are lots of settings that you can use to take great photos for various scenes and situations.

Reviews.Title: powershot
Reviews.Author: Gwen
Reviews.Content: it's small but tuff. it has a great zoom. over all the camera has lots of options.it has a really fast turn on time so you don't miss shots.

Reviews.Title: The best
Reviews.Author: Clay Adams
Reviews.Content: For years I've wanted a small point-and-shoot camera with a powerful zoom and wide-angle stabilized lens that takes great pictures. This year exactly such a camera was finally available: the Canon PowerShot ELPH 520. It has 12x optical zoom! No other camera is this thin (0.8") and this powerful.

Reviews.Title: Great Concert Camera
Reviews.Author: Tina M. Morrison
Reviews.Content: I bought this as an upgrade to my old Cannon Powershot Elph. After a lot of research, I settled on what I know and like (Cannon).  I wasn't disappointed.  Small enough to carry in your back pocket, but with enough zoom to take great shots.

Reviews.Title: Eh...
Reviews.Author: K. Jones "kjay12"
Reviews.Content: I am a professional photographer and I am almost always seen lugging around my DSLR with all my lenses. But there are times when I want a good camera, but can't carry all my equipment with me. Enter the ELPH 520 HS. I bought this because it was small, it has an incredible 12x optical zoom, a large LCD screen, it will "burst shoot", and it takes HD video at the touch of a button. First of all let me say that I understand this is not a DSLR so it will never live up to those standards, however there are a few things that I felt really should have performed better:-If it isn't a bright, sunny day (or a brightly lit scene) forget trying to get ANYTHING in focus with this camera even if your subject is moving only slightly.-Even if conditions are optimum, the image quality of this camera is only so-so. There seems to be a lot of grain and noise and it's quite distracting.-The HD video is very underwhelming. The camera seemed to be confused most of the time when trying to focus. It would constantly change focus on different subjects which I found to be absolutely maddening. The video itself looked more like SD to me (and yes, I did check the settings to make sure I was shooting in full HD). The camera boasts the ability to zoom in and out while filming without losing focus on the subject. Yeah, right. I had no luck with this. Every time I would try to adjust the zoom, the video would lose clarity and there was also the annoying sound of the motor while zooming in and out which is then recorded onto your video. Hmmm...-The buttons are confusing. They are placed in a strange configuration IMO and I had a hard time changing settings with any speed at all. I realize they had to be placed this way in order to fit on the camera at all, but one thing that would have helped tremendously is to have the "SET" button in the middle of the arrow buttons like it is on most Canon PowerShot models.Overall, I would have to say that I really wouldn't recommend this camera. I sold it after 8 months of use and went back to using my old Canon Powershot SX100 IS. This camera may be old, but it outperforms the ELPH 520 in terms of image quality and video quality (even though it is only SD).

Reviews.Title: nice compact camera
Reviews.Author: chchips1
Reviews.Content: I've only had the camera a short while but I'm looking forward to using it.  The only one down side to this package was that I wish the company had included even a minimal micro sd card to use immediately.  Word to the wise.....I ordered the camera and the micro sd card from diferent suppliers on amazon.  The camera showed up first and then I had to wait for the micro sd card to come in from another supplier which took about a week longer. Just something to keep in mind if you're looking to use your camera immediately.As far as the camera, it's nice and compact, easy to fit in my pocket book and pull out whenever I need it. I'm looking forward to experimenting with it!

Reviews.Title: very low quality pictures
Reviews.Author: Alexander Nekrasov
Reviews.Content: Bought this recently, but will be returning soon.With all settings set to highest quality - Super Fine compression, highest resolution, neutral colors, auto WB, ISO200, - in bright light and ideal conditions for photography, the camera produces pictures that look like they've been through a Jpeg converter several times. Whites are blown, everything but the immediate focus area is pixelated. And all mid- to dark areas are noisy.It's like it's back to mid-1990s.Pretty useless except for making avatars for social networks.

Reviews.Title: Battery drainer
Reviews.Author: Vanessa Rockey
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is very unpredictable but my main complaint is the battery drainage. On a fully charged battery, it starts blinking low battery after shooting 5 minutes of video. That's not ok

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly My Least Favorite Canon Compact
Reviews.Author: Joseph B.
Reviews.Content: I have always been a huge Canon fan but this camera seemed to never work very well. The pictures just never seemed to impress me like the previous 2 canon compacts I owned. I still love the brand but will be more skeptical in the future. Also the black metal seems to scratch easily.

Reviews.Title: Disapointed
Reviews.Author: Ron More "chandelle"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Canon PowerShot Elph 520 HS as an upgrade to my two existing Canon cameras. I have a Canon PowerShot SD 600 and a Canon PowerShot SX 110  IS.  Basically I wanted the PowerShot SD 600 small size and the 12 X  magnification with the image stabilization. The PowerShot Elph 520 HS specs filled the bill.  Unfortunately, the image is grainy even with the IS turned off. Both of my other Canon cameras have much sharper images. I returned the camera. Should have read the reviews on CNET besides just Amazon.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Christopher J. Volny "Chris"
Reviews.Content: This camera works well with gphoto2:// in GNOME 3.x Linux (Fedora 19). Sometimes I have to copy / rsync the files myself due to some weird glitch where I can view, but cannot copy files via that protocol in nautilus.As for a point and shoot camera, this thing is great! It's not as convenient as pulling out the smartphone, but we got this for the bachelors bachelorette parties and wedding (behind the scenes) and it's served its purpose great.

Reviews.Title: Not a fan...doesn't take great photos
Reviews.Author: Ingrid Alvarez "www.Connectingmoms.com"
Reviews.Content: Not a fan...doesn't take great photos. It is light but it makes my daughter look like a cartoon.Just go straight to the Rebel T3i

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: J. Ogul
Reviews.Content: This is a nice little camera.  The only thing I don't like about it is it uses micro SD rather than full size SD cards.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Lori Conklin
Reviews.Content: Took great pictures especially close ups...it's a great on the go camera.  I highly would recommend this camera especially for beginners or someone who is snap happy. Battery does last long but  I bought a extra adapter and battery so  I can have a spare for emergencies.

Reviews.Title: Confusing Functionality
Reviews.Author: Jill
Reviews.Content: The functionality of the buttons on this camera is confusing. Your "scroll left" and "scroll right" buttons are not labeled as such, and the button on the top that you push to view the photos on the camera does not take you back to camera mode when pushed again; it actually puts the camera into Sleep mode. We were trying to figure out how to get back to Camera mode after viewing pictures, and it turns out you have to push the shutter button down halfway. Deleting pictures is about a 3-step process. I really am not pleased with this, and I bought it for my 78-year-old dad after reading about it on a "best cameras for senior citizens" website. I seem to mind the confusing buttons more than he does, though. I asked him if he wanted me to find him a different camera, and he said no. So we'll see how it goes.

Reviews.Title: Eh...
Reviews.Author: Jessica B. Hart
Reviews.Content: I generally like Kodak but thought I would give Canon a try. I am not very impressed with the quality of photos and don't use 90% of the functions. The zoom quality is pretty good...I was able to get some neat pictures of the Blood Moon a few months ago, but otherwise it is just a basic camera. The software comes with way too much stuff that I also don't use other than downloading the pictures to my computer. The lens is difficult to clean when dirty but the pictures it takes are okay for basic memories.

Reviews.Title: Just okay
Reviews.Author: L. Cook
Reviews.Content: The pictures taken are decent enough with this camera - but, I have two big issues with the ease of using this camera.  I guess I didn't read the specs closely enough, but this thing is very small.  I am an average size woman, and I feel like my fingers are constantly getting in the picture.  It feels like my hand just engulfs it.  It's kind of tough to take a picture because it is just so small to handle.  Also, I am used to using a camera with a little trash can button for disposal of photos.  This camera doesn't have it and it bothers me more than anything else about it.  To delete a picture, you have to go in through the menu file button.  Very cumbersome.  I disliked this camera so much that not even 2 months later I bought a new point and shoot camera.

Reviews.Title: Point, shoot, done.
Reviews.Author: MBO
Reviews.Content: Pros:Small, light, easy to carry.Fast & easy to use.Reasonably intuitive interface.Nice stabilization software.Great battery lifeCons:Could boot up a bit quicker.LCD inaccurately displays noise in photos that isn't there.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Pictures
Reviews.Author: Bobbie J. Ballance
Reviews.Content: I really love this camera because it takes such clear pictures.  One thing that is cumbersome is that it uses a micro SD cardand you need the adapter to insert it in many printers.  I'm also just getting used to it because it is a little different than my last camera.  Overall it was a great bargain.

Reviews.Title: Great photos in normal environment with Auto mode. For lower light or kids, set to Manual at 400iso.
Reviews.Author: K. szemeredi "laszlo"
Reviews.Content: Have 3 older models of Powershot ELPH, and love them. Needing better zoom, this one helps, in the sense that it is better than the other new models that are terrible with KIDS.  They do not have "KIDS" setting any more !!  WHY ?  All it needs is a faster Shutter with higher ISO... why is that so hard to preset Canon?  You guys have all these weird styles of shots, but NO KIDS !!So, this model has the multi-shutter capability, so the longer I hold the shutter, the more frames it takes. It will catch that freeze-frame event. But get a bit ahead of the shot, so there is time to focus on the target...then press down for a second... and BAM bam bam, you get to pick the frame you like best. Realize, YOU got to be still too... don't get so excited that you are moving with the action. You have to go to the Video mode on that.  Looks great on playing it back on HD-TV.  The battery is not the same, so I cannot interchange with the older models. And the MicroSD card is harder to eject than the standard ones.  All-in-all - I Like it  :)

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot Camera
Reviews.Author: bdaviseyes
Reviews.Content: Love the way it looks and the compact size. My Son likes the fact he can put it in his shirt pocket.  Only thing,  have not had the chance to save pictures yet. Waiting on a memory card you have to have before it will work. Cant wait. Betty Davis

Reviews.Title: Bought for my photographer husband
Reviews.Author: Julia "close-enuff"
Reviews.Content: This camera is a homerun according to my husband who has a degree in photography.  The single best aspect is that the camera easily fits in a pocket, meaning that it is always available.  You can capture just about any photo since it has a 12x zoom.  One of the best features is being able to zoom in the details of the photo as you view it in the camera.  Takes photos in all kinds of light without the flash.  And the price is right.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Katherine Koehn "wildkat"
Reviews.Content: Love this camera! Only downside is figuring out the playback functions to edit and review pix after you hit the playback button.  Great picture quality.  the zoom works a lot better at stabilizing my image than my Nikon!

Reviews.Title: Cannon  520 powershot
Reviews.Author: Fred
Reviews.Content: Only have had it a few days, but used it and tried different things and really like the way it works. After I have had it for a while I will write another review.

Reviews.Title: just what i wanted
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Goering
Reviews.Content: I wanted a point and shoot camera that was user friendly, but had good zoom capabilities. I haven't been disappointed.

Reviews.Title: great camera for price.
Reviews.Author: LLM
Reviews.Content: No complaints...nice pics and easy  to use. Uses very small card with adapter...was not included.  Would buy again. I am just a point and shoot type.

Reviews.Title: This is nice camera
Reviews.Author: noknots "noknots"
Reviews.Content: We are still trying to figure out all it will do, we don't get out much but the pictures we have gotten so far are pretty good but I still need to put in another software to lighten them up, the auto isn't that hot.

Reviews.Title: Its so tiny!
Reviews.Author: Anthony Smith "RticPhoenix"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a little vacation I was planning. Then decided I'd never use it and tried to cancel the order but I was to late. I'm glad I opened it up and looked at it before shipping it back because I really like this little guy. It's smaller then an iphone even thought its wider, is definitely the best pocket-point-and-shoot camera I've ever had. Very happy that I didn't return it.ProsSize, weight, quality.ConsUses Micro Mini SD card, takes a bit to figure out how to use program mode, not USB chargeable

Reviews.Title: What a great little camera.
Reviews.Author: OAH "Oh"
Reviews.Content: And I do mean little. It is easy to take along in your purse or pocket, takes great pictures. I bought it for work as I couldn't get the quality I needed on my phone camera.

Reviews.Title: nice price good quality
Reviews.Author: Tingzhi Yan
Reviews.Content: It is the lowest price that i saw in one year. It looks good and works well. The only pity is that the Panoramic image mosaic technology is not good, and that technology of Sumsing and Sony is better than Canon.

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: R. Leija
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera mainly for its compact size.  Add the picture quality and good battery life and it makes a great alternative (or replacement) to a camera phone.

Reviews.Title: BOOM
Reviews.Author: Laura M. Sasser
Reviews.Content: This Canon is awesome.  It's like the quick and accurate cannon shot! It fits into my pocket always to use.  I love the Canon Camera! It delivers pure vision. lighting when necessary, several view options, movie maker ... my lit can go on and on.

Reviews.Title: OK
Reviews.Author: fivejays1
Reviews.Content: Much more cumbersome to use than our previous PowerShot camera. Good video quality. Still pictures auto focus will not hold true focus, all looks good until you spap a picture, then it may or may not give you a clear pic. Not all that happy so far.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera.
Reviews.Author: Paul B
Reviews.Content: This is a much better camera than my previous generation Canon. It is smaller, more versatile, higher resolution (10M) and has great zoom capability. The battery is a special Canon rechargeable, NB-9L, quickly revived by included recharger. They are cheap so  I usually carry a second fresh battery, but rarely need it. I bought an adapter for the tiny (size) memory so that I can put it straight into my computer without using the cable. I can download a huge number of photos quicker that way. The function, display and menu buttons are not intuitive, and take some getting used to, as there are so many options.  Overall, a great camera.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Camera, No Surprises, New in the box, all Warranty Items present, very compact!
Reviews.Author: Consumer
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, in fact this is my second one purchased.  I bought my wife one for Christmas, and I loved it so much, that I decided to get one for myself, as a pocket camera to supplement my DSLR.

Reviews.Title: Great Quality
Reviews.Author: Candidlynn
Reviews.Content: I really struggled in picking a camera. I wanted quality photos and good video. I think that this camera really does the trick. I am really happy with it. The only thing I wish was better is the battery life and navigation through the settings.

Reviews.Title: Great zoom lens
Reviews.Author: Skiffle queen
Reviews.Content: Many negatives about this camera - no good dust cover on the lens, it will be affected by dust really easily. The buttons are way too small and the micro SD card is a pain in the neck. HOWEVER you will LOVE the zoom on this camera. I have already taken some great pictures of wildlife.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Mike Foley
Reviews.Content: I love it so much that when someone stole mine off an airplane I'd just left, that I ordered another within 24 hours. I love the size, and, most of all, because I take more video than still pictures, I really like it's video capabilities. I have a Canon HG F10 video camera that I use most of the time, but this little camera when used in tight areas, or as a supplemental video camera is terrific.I've read a few reviews stating that the battery life is short, but seems for video they last very well. (I ordered a couple of replacement batteries off of Amazon (not Canon) they work great.

Reviews.Title: Lovely Point and Shoot
Reviews.Author: Rachel
Reviews.Content: A great point and shoot for the price! It has a ton of great settings and comes out with same amazing pictures. I've taken it on a few vacations so far and I still love it. Its very slender, so be aware that if you prefer heavier cameras this is not the one for you.

Reviews.Title: Canon rocks
Reviews.Author: Mario
Reviews.Content: Enjoying my new camera! If there are any left I would encourage to buy. Great shots and HD video. Having fun!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Lefor
Reviews.Content: It takes great pictures.  The battery lasts quite awhile.  I did buy another battery just in case but haven't had any issues.

Reviews.Title: Good zoom, but needs higher resolution and more robustness
Reviews.Author: Lyman L. Parkhurst
Reviews.Content: Second day I used the camera on a 3-week trip and it got dropped.  Screen got multiple cracks, but still worked. Have had several previous similar Canon cameras, dropped them all a number of times and never cracked a screen.The lens cover looks cool, but the fan blade shaped cover looks delicate.  By the end of the 3-weeks of heavy use it would frequently not completely close.Zoom and other features are very nice, but I have to use the Large format setting to get a decent resolution and 2-2.5 MB picture.

Reviews.Title: The camera is just ok
Reviews.Author: Muzzer "Jan"
Reviews.Content: I had a Canon Power Shot before this one that I liked alot better ~ took great pictures.  This one ~ not so good.  Consequently I use my phone camera the most.  I was hoping this would have sharper pictures.

Reviews.Title: Yet another Canon
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Just like the little pink bunny…a Canon just keeps on going…this is my 3rd or 4th Canon…I just keep going back to them. My last Canon is still going…I just wanted a new one, a blue one…why just 4 stars? because I never give 5 stars…Nothing is ever perfect, or the best. but this little blue one is very close! Love it…my only problem…the battery goes down very fast compared to my last two canons…but the good thing about that, is the charger that comes w/ it…just plug it in and you've got it back.get'cha one and enjoy!

Reviews.Title: Awesome little camera!
Reviews.Author: T. L. Johnson "Happi Grammi"
Reviews.Content: I bought this to take on our trip to Mexico.  I didn't want to pack my SLR everywhere.  The quality of the camera and the photos is impressive! With most point and shoot camera bodies being plastic, I was very impressed that the Elph has an all metal body. I love that I can put it in my back pocket! Best small point and shoot camera I've ever used!

Reviews.Title: The worst battery I ever have
Reviews.Author: Yuexian Yang
Reviews.Content: I was very happy on first day when camera arrived, but the battery died on me at next day. Even worse, it without any warning! Few seconds before, it shows full bars, then, suddenly blacked out. I thought I got a bad battery, After Amazon kindly refund me $30 for it, I ordered an extra pair of them. Believe or not, the other two just behaved same like the original one. some reviews mentioned the battery problem, is really that bad? Hope some pro can help me.

Reviews.Title: GReat camera but annoying wait for camera to focus
Reviews.Author: chapterblack
Reviews.Content: headline sums it up ...takes awesome videos in HD and great pictures with a plethora of settings the only gripe being its annoying wait for the thing to auto focus when changing scenery for videos and pics sometimes

Reviews.Title: Excellent auto features
Reviews.Author: D. Craig
Reviews.Content: Very nice camera.  Wanted something that fit easily in my pocket, has good close up resolution and is easy to use.  This camera meets all of my wants.  I am particularly impressed with the breadth, utility, and functionality of the auto setting  I have not had any reason to use the manual settings.  The image stabilization is particularly attractive as is the focus lock.

Reviews.Title: perfect camera
Reviews.Author: mvav2002
Reviews.Content: Got this for myself as an early Christmas gift and love it..the color is great, the zoom is amazing, and the screen on the back to view your pics/videos is really big. For the first time I was able to get good pics and videos at my girl's Christmas concert! Plus the compact size makes it easy to carry with me when I want. My mom and my sister have the same camera but with the 8x optical zoom.  Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Excellent snapshot camera with extra capabilities
Reviews.Author: A. Carr "game hater"
Reviews.Content: This camera is essentially an updated version of the ELPH SD1000.  I know this because I also own that camera.  This camera has a longer zoom, easier to use macro, and improved automated functions.  It uses a microSD card which requires an adapter to mate with a PC.  The camera is small, but hefty.  Easy to carry and quick to bring to action.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!!
Reviews.Author: Chuck Mulry
Reviews.Content: This camera is a great compact model that does everything that the more expensive and bulky units do! The pictures are great and the clarity rivals any camera that I have ever used! Lots of extra features and at a great price!!  Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Good pictures
Reviews.Author: John Delly
Reviews.Content: I am pleased with the camera. I'm still learning all the bells and whistles, but the Auto settling is fine for most snapshots.  I have taken pictures of our clubs Christmas party, an outside wedding, Christmas lights in the neighborhood. The best shots I've taken has been of birds - sharp and clear even when zoomed to the max.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: Cynthia L. Taylor "Queen Mommy Zombie"
Reviews.Content: Camera meets all my expectations! I am a REALTOR(R) so need to take home photos that are crisp and clear. Also,as a miniature artisan, it's important that I'm able to photograph my small creations clearly.

Reviews.Title: canon
Reviews.Author: J
Reviews.Content: For the price this takes GREAT pictures and it is simple to use.  I like that it is small and I can easily take it everywhere.  I haven't had any complaints about the quality of the camera or the pictures it takes :)

Reviews.Title: Amazing technology
Reviews.Author: Greg Henton
Reviews.Content: This thing is leaps and bounds above my HP camera bought only 3 years ago.  Too many features to mention.  Excellent picture quality.  Great movies.  Takes about 2 days of serious self teaching to get a handle on the full capabilities.  Auto mode is nearly idiot proof which helps a lot in my case.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected
Reviews.Author: S. Sperling "outdoor girl"
Reviews.Content: I had another Canon Powershot that "drowned" when I fell through the ice on a frozen lake (that's another story).  I bought this thinking it would be a suitable, maybe even superior replacement.  I could not tell from the info given in the on-line ad that the SD card is a micro instead of standard.  Also, the battery is different than my other Powershot.  So that is two new things to buy (I go into the wilderness for a week at a time so always need a backup battery and prefer to have a backup SD card).  The edges on the camera are very sharp compared to my previous camera where they were rounded.  Since I carry my camera in my pocket, the rounded edges are preferred.  Finally, and most importantly, the photos aren't of the quality that I expect from a Canon product.  Disappointing.

Reviews.Title: Fast sleek point and shoot
Reviews.Author: David Green "Book Supporter"
Reviews.Content: Best power shot on the market right now.Great pictures on auto plus plenty of extra functionality for the amateur  photographer.Fast delivery

Reviews.Title: Slick camera
Reviews.Author: Victor D. Stuckey
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for my mom and it was very user friendly.  Pictures and features are great.  Would definately recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great little point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Bertouc "bertouc"
Reviews.Content: This is a great little point and shoot camera for the price.  Takes nice quality photos.  Has a higher MP count then similarly priced cameras and a good optical zoom.  Very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Christopher
Reviews.Content: This is a small-sized camera that fits well in a pocket or purse.  Takes good pictures and is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Just right for me!
Reviews.Author: Laurie J. Boggs "Laurie B."
Reviews.Content: I needed a point and shoot camera to replace mine, which was taken in a burglary of my home.  This one is just right for me!  I was able to get it up and going in minutes and it takes beautiful, clear, sharp pictures on the go!  If you are looking for a simple, compact camera for capturing the moments of your children or grandchildren's lives, or to record vacation and family fun quickly so that you don't miss any of the experiences yourself, this is a great little camera!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic for the price
Reviews.Author: D. Calhoun "davemchine"
Reviews.Content: This is the perfect pocketable, or purse, camera. It is very small and light weight. If you want to be as minimalistic as possible but still have more zoom than a camera phone can provide this is the way to go. My only criticism would be it takes noisy pictures at full zoom or in low light. Given the price I think it is an acceptable trade off though.

Reviews.Title: Cobalt blue!  Cinched the deal!
Reviews.Author: J. Smart
Reviews.Content: Great little camera.  This is my third Elph. Got it for a trip to Europe last summer and it didn't disappoint.  Great clear pictures, and you just can't beat the size/feel of this camera.

Reviews.Title: Excellent pictures
Reviews.Author: Harry T Garland
Reviews.Content: All I can say is that the pictures that I take with this camera turn out better than anything I have taken before. I love that it can focus very close in without the need for a separate macro lens. I even dropped it in water; it stopped working for a day, but then was back to normal.

Reviews.Title: Good value and great size.
Reviews.Author: B. Barrett
Reviews.Content: Great little camera. Good size, good pictures and videos. A hard working little camera. A good value for the money.

Reviews.Title: Nice images but TOO SMALL!
Reviews.Author: Chris De Pree
Reviews.Content: While the picture quality was good, the camera itself was simply too small to be easy to handle and use. We ended up returning the camera.

Reviews.Title: good camera for student
Reviews.Author: Delsa
Reviews.Content: this was a gift for my son and he loves this camera! It shipped quickly and is just what he needed.

Reviews.Title: Big little camera
Reviews.Author: David L grundy
Reviews.Content: great little camera, easy to use and quick to master, great for those closeups and the long shots, the zoom is the bomb, lats me get wounderful shots.

Reviews.Title: Nice, Easy to Use Point and Shoot Camera
Reviews.Author: tiffany 123456
Reviews.Content: This camera is sleek, and easy to use. The picture quality is perfect for me as an amateur photographer who really just wants photos of her kids and the occasional scenery shot. My only complaint is that this camera doesn't self-stabilize as quickly as some others that I have had, but I believe that it makes up for this by taking a better quality photo overall.To add, my 6 year old and 8 year old can use it and get quality pictures too!

Reviews.Title: lovely camera - well worth the price!
Reviews.Author: Bartlett Pair
Reviews.Content: This compact camera does it all for a point and shoot.  There are various settings you can use if you are a more experienced photographer.  And if you just want to take pictures with little or no fuss, it is great.  I had considered a Nikon but choose Canon because I have two other Canon cameras and the icons, menus, functions are the same in all.  I just didn't want to learn a whole new system.In spite of giving this camera five stars, I have two negatives.  There is no optical view finder which is really helpful in bright sunlight.  This was not a deal-killer for me as I plan to use this camera for family outings, celebrations and get-togethers.  And there is no instruction manual.  Canon provided a CD which allows you to download a .pdf file.  But who wants to carry something like that around?  My old Canon compact camera had a small instruction manual which was easy to put into the camera case.

Reviews.Title: Cute little present
Reviews.Author: Postitnoter
Reviews.Content: This made a great wedding gift for my nephews wedding.  I gave it to him about a month early so they could get familar with it before they took it with them on their honeymoon.  They comment just about every time I see them about how much they like their new little camara.I can't comment on any of it's features because I never used it, but it makes a great present.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Outdoorgal
Reviews.Content: I have two other, far pricier Canon cameras- just bought this to have a small one to fit in my purse. This takes better pictures than my other 2, more expensive cameras! (Granted they are a couple of years old, but this is a fraction of the price!)

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Audrey Klawiter
Reviews.Content: Camera was abreast price and takes great pics.  I use it for everyday life pics and so far hey are wonderful.  The video works just as well.  Very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Supposedly Discontinued
Reviews.Author: JD Grewell
Reviews.Content: I bought my first 520 Elph about 2 years ago via Costco and fell in love with it's size, accuracy, ease of use, and long battery life.  I use it professionally every day.  I tried four other brands that all failed to meet my needs.  The Elph surpased them, so that is why I bought a backup already.  Fantastic product.  I issue 50 page inspection reports and typically prodce 150 photos per report.  The Elph more than met my needs.

Reviews.Title: Canon Power Shot ELPH 520 HS 10.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera w/12x Optical
Reviews.Author: Logan
Reviews.Content: It's an easy camera to use, the pictures so far have been crisp and clear. I'm still getting use to it, but I do like the fact that the camera seems to correct pictures with the stabilizer feature.  The only thing I would change in it so far is the batteries. I do like a camera that uses regular double "A" batteries more.  It saves time on charging, and would be a better selling point on cameras to offer the double "A" batteries instead of the constant feature of a camera that you need to charge with an expensive battery.  That would be the only thing I would change, other than that I find it a great camera.

Reviews.Title: great compact camera
Reviews.Author: Erin Figueira
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera a couple of months and am very pleased with it.  Sharp photos, awesome zoom, fast shutter, many program and flash options.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: ThymeX
Reviews.Content: Got this camera for my Mom very easy for her to use, it zooms in super close, the screen is big enough for her to see, the buttons could be a touch bigger but she could still figure them out even though they were tiny, she easily figured out the battery(love that it only fits one way) and the micro sd slot. She loved the color & took tons of pictures on our vacation something she didn't do with her old camera.

Reviews.Title: Canon powershot
Reviews.Author: Cynthia R
Reviews.Content: I like just about everything about this Canon which I bought to replace a similar Nikon that exaspated me.  I took side by side shots with both cameras and the color is far superior in the Canon and it is simpler and more intuitive for me to use.  Love it!

Reviews.Title: Had one of the first
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I dropped it and broke it after owning it for 6 years and could not live without it so bought another one not to disappoint.  I do like the old battery and card better but other than that I love this camera.

Reviews.Title: It is light and easy to use. Great Pictures.
Reviews.Author: DLynn
Reviews.Content: It is everything I expected from Canon. I had an older model Canon and wanted a newer, smaller one for a trip I am taking. This one is great: I'm enjoying it immensely.

Reviews.Title: Performs as expected
Reviews.Author: Nick deLannoy
Reviews.Content: Great picture quality when settings are adjusted manually. Indoor photos are a little grainy, but that's not what I bought the camera for anyways. Satisfactory macro capability. Very low battery life, but getting a few spare batteries is no problem. Overall, this is a great camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: great little camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Bonnie Griffith
Reviews.Content: sharp pictures, great lowlight and the video is easy and works well... plus the zoom is more than i expected

Reviews.Title: Great camera, fast shipping!
Reviews.Author: Jeff Cornelius
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera that packs a punch in a such a small package!  I am enjoying it!

Reviews.Title: canon wins again.
Reviews.Author: Casey Drexhage "western fan"
Reviews.Content: This is a birthday gift for my wife because it is a simple point and shoot if wanted plus the zoom I wanted for whale watching.We have had 3 other canons before and like the size and feel. They keep making improvements.

Reviews.Title: Gets the job done!
Reviews.Author: angelica
Reviews.Content: This item was ordered for the office and my guys seem to like it very much...we need to take pics of vehicles, accidents etc, they would make it know if they did not like it.

Reviews.Title: Best Camer
Reviews.Author: JAMES WHITE III
Reviews.Content: Got this camera for a steal. My 3rd Canon in the Powershot Elph line (I've lost and broken a few).  This one is by far the best. Shoots HD, 3 in LCD, and 12X OPTICAL zoom. Unheard of in a camera this size. Love it

Reviews.Title: Small, great value and takes fantastic photos
Reviews.Author: Michael Buckley
Reviews.Content: I've owned several digital cameras over the past decade, including point and shoots as well as D-SLRs. I bought this to take with me on a rugged backpacking trip across China as I didn't want to lug around my D-SLR. This was the perfect substitute. Great zoom, small-sized, sturdy, takes great low light shots, has endless settings...the list goes on and on.

Reviews.Title: Just okay.
Reviews.Author: Dr.S
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to shoot close-up nature shots (ie. birds) while on my stand-up paddleboard. It is small and light enough to fit in my pocket and quickly pull out when the moment presents itself.  It seemed like the perfect camera. Theoretically.  The reality is, unfortunately, that the picture quality  is unimpressive, almost not worth the bother. I gave it two stars for picture quality  and one star for its compact design.  Doesn't hold a candle to the image quality and features on my Canon 300HS.  I absolutely love that camera.  Problem is that it only has a 5X zoom.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Paul Braun
Reviews.Content: Pictures are clear.  Macro works great! Camera is small but easy to use! No more taking 2-3 pictures to get one good one!

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: sharon g johnson
Reviews.Content: This camera is smaller and more beautiful than I expected. It takes gorgeous pictures. It's easy to use too. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Solstad
Reviews.Content: A perfect little camera.  It has a large picture view window, but is super small in size making it easy to take on any travels.  Picture quality is excellent, easy to use, and of course the red is beautiful.  One small criticism: sometimes it seems to take more force to press the shutter button than it should, but perhaps I am too used to touch screens and having an automatic response.

Reviews.Title: Solid Product HQ Picture
Reviews.Author: Shuxiang 'Albert' Li
Reviews.Content: It's very good Canon product with the solid package. When you hold it you can feel it like a HQ product. It was not like other plastic packaged cameras. Picture quality is super.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera.
Reviews.Author: Mark Brickman "mbrickman"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to carry in my pocket so i could take pictures and videos on the fly.  The camera is very easy to use and the photographic/video quality is great.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Lue Vang
Reviews.Content: Was a great gift for the MIL for mothers day! Would recommend to anyone. She enjoys it very much. Thank you very much!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera. Great Price.
Reviews.Author: David Sexton
Reviews.Content: Great camera.  The micro sd card doesn't bother me.  It fits easily into the adapter for use on the computer.  It takes great photos and movies.  Many reviews didn't give it the best ratings, but a lot of them were reviewing it as a $300 camera.  It is now just over $100.  Get a small hdmi to large hdmi cord ($2-3 on ebay) and you can watch the photos and movies on your tv.  Get one you'll be suprised!

Reviews.Title: Very nice, tiny camera.
Reviews.Author: Zman "coffee-nut"
Reviews.Content: The Canon ELPH is very small and loaded with nice features. It's a terrific point and shoot camera for anyone, and the price is amazingly low for such quality. Good pictures, nice features, and low price....what more could you ask for!

Reviews.Title: 用起来感觉不错
Reviews.Author: Allan Lee
Reviews.Content: The image quality is good, very portable, and price is very affordable, really inexpensive! With respect to China's cheap..Ha, ha, ha..成像质量不错，非常的便携，价格也非常实惠，真是物美价廉哈！相对于中国的价格便宜多了。。哈哈哈。。

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: andrea sabino
Reviews.Content: I bought the Canon to replace my Kodak Easyshare that always took blurry photos.  So far, I am loving it.  Shots are clear, the tracking is a great feature and I'm learning the 'extras' slowly.  My favorite is the Color Accent.  The size of the camera is a plus and the auto feature does everything it needs to to get the shot right.  I would give it 5 stars but some of the features are confusing to either get to or use, otherwise, it is a fabulous purchase for someone looking for an everyday-use camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice little Camera!
Reviews.Author: The Dude
Reviews.Content: I've taken pictures of distant snow covered mountains, wildlife, and used the zoom on all of them. Loaded them on my PC and they look great! If you blow them up to a larger size you can see the noise but you don't have to do that in order to enjoy the pictures on your PC or Facebook page.  People talk about noise, any photo camera can have noise if you blow the picture up high enough. As far as battery life goes, I've taken 72 photos and the battery is still at 100 percent. If you are a casual photo shooter then this camera is a really good choice. To the Pro's I say, "take your reviews somewhere else and stop comparing this camera to your pro models.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera for the money
Reviews.Author: William Munn
Reviews.Content: The only reason I gave 4 stars on this way since I don't like the way the buttons feel on the camera.  Everything seems a bit recessed and hard to press compared to the last Canon Elph I had.  Camera takes great pictures and was a good value for the money.  The LCD screen is a bit grainy, but this is not reflected in the pictures.  Overall I am happy that I bought this camera.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Camera
Reviews.Author: asseraf
Reviews.Content: Its compact and a very nice 1 to carry... This is so far the nicest one from Canon (I think)

Reviews.Title: nice compact camera
Reviews.Author: Richard Malloy "Torque"
Reviews.Content: I'm not a professional photographer or anything, but this camera has done some nice work for me so far.  Thank you Canon.

Reviews.Title: I bought this for my friend
Reviews.Author: Rachel "The Walker"
Reviews.Content: She loves this camera. It's her first experience with on ELPH, and now she's hooked. She's going to be a grandma soon, so it will get quite a workout.

Reviews.Title: Wife love it
Reviews.Author: C Gilbert
Reviews.Content: We have purchased many Powershots in the past, and they just keep getting better. The picture quality is great, and the larger screen on an overall smaller camera is great.

Reviews.Title: Canon is great!
Reviews.Author: David J. Karoly
Reviews.Content: This elph 520hs is the Cats Meow!Canon is the way to go and made in Japan.I believe they make the best cameras in the world.

Reviews.Title: A versatile small travel camera
Reviews.Author: Dominic YUE "u2gp"
Reviews.Content: A versatile small camera that can be carried anywhere to produce good quality picture.  Everything I have expected from Canon ELPH.

Reviews.Title: Canon is great
Reviews.Author: D. Roberts "anoldhippy"
Reviews.Content: I have owned 5 different Canon point and shoot cameras. They are small in size, but give me plenty of options to get great shots.And add in the HD movie capabilites and you have a great little camera.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Camera
Reviews.Author: NAVLE "ECM"
Reviews.Content: I had this camera for more than a year.  It takes fantastic photos!! I couldn't take a bad picture even when I try.  Takes great shots in low light, hardly ever (never?) use the flash, though it has a mode where it would take two pictures back to back one with and one without the flash.  It has a great zoom capability and a great stabilizer.  Super light and pretty sturdy. I carry it everywhere I go, in my purse or in my pocket.  Like I said, it made a good photographer out of me!  I am going to keep it until it stops working, hopefully for a long long time.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Library Lady
Reviews.Content: Purchased to replace my old Canon PowerShot, the ELPH 520 takes great photos, is easy to use, has a 12X optical zoom, is small and lightweight, and comes in many colors, including this cool blue.  What's not to like?

Reviews.Title: Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: Big TJ
Reviews.Content: This camera was a gift for my wife.  She loved it because it was RED her favorite color.  I appears to have all the bells and whistles she needs.  One note that you need a micro SD card vs. the full size SD card she used in her other Cannon PS camera.

Reviews.Title: Camera as Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Shelbi S.
Reviews.Content: Gave this camera to my significant other for Christmas.  He seems to really like it.  The pictures are clear and the camera is really small.  He wanted one that would fit in his pocket for hunting season and it easily fits in his shirt pocket.  The only downside I can see is the buttons are close together because of the camera being so small.  Someone with large fingers may have a hard time with that feature.  Other than that, we are pleased.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: njn "Voracious reader"
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas gift for my husband and he loves it. He is not the world's best photographer but this camera makes it easier for him to take good pictures.

Reviews.Title: Sooo far very good.
Reviews.Author: Brian McDowell
Reviews.Content: Just received the camera for Christmas.  Sooo far it is everything I expected. The pictures are excellent quality with the 1080 P.  Nice and compact to take anywhere.  Fits in any pocket. Great color. light weight.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, great video, great zoom and great color
Reviews.Author: Pinaki Basu "Pinaki"
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my mom. The picture and video quality is too good, the optical zoom is much better than the standard point & shoot cameras, and the color is amazing. It also has all the goodies of options that canon provides while taking a picture - different modes without configuring much - best suited for my mom who is not a gadget friendly person. She loves it. Yet I can configure the parameters on manual or custom modes.

Reviews.Title: Great travel camers
Reviews.Author: me
Reviews.Content: This is a really good camera. It takes outstanding photos. Bought it for my wife to replace her somewhat beat up Nikon camera. Now I'm thinking my next travel camera will be a Canon.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Norma
Reviews.Content: i got the camera  few days a go so far i love it, its small enough to put in my pocket.the images it takes  are awesome.

Reviews.Title: Canon Elph 520hs
Reviews.Author: albertine flaubert
Reviews.Content: Have used it for only one day and find the macro just what I'd hoped for the wildflower photography I like to do on hikes. The telephoto, while only 12x, is amazing for such a small camera. Size is why it will go with me wherever.

Reviews.Title: Canon Camera
Reviews.Author: Rackets
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my wifes visit to see grandchildren after my old canon headed south. She couldn't use it technically but it takes FANTASTIC pictures. Almost feel you can reach out and touch the subject the clearity is so good. EXCELLENT value..Would recommend to anyone who will read the user manual

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the money!
Reviews.Author: M
Reviews.Content: I got this for my son for a class at school- it's very small and light, easy to put in a small case and carry in a backpack without adding a lot of weight, I borrow it when I don't want to carry a larger camera.  It has good features & takes great pictures but it has minimal buttons and was a little confusing to figure out how to operate all of the features.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 520 HS .... Nice Still Pics, Video Not So Much; File format Issues
Reviews.Author: Semore Blues
Reviews.Content: This camera takes nice still photos but the video leaves much to be desired.  I was quite disappointed in the quality of the video, especially when using zoom.  Also, it uses a file format that is incompatible with my Panasonic HDTV so I cannot hook it up to the tv to watch my videos.  Also, I cannot edit the video using Windows Live Movie Maker as when I try, it crashes the program.  I don't recall the format but you may want to check this out before purchasing.  If I had known the problems I was going to have, I would have purchased a Panasonic Lumix, which would have been compatible with my tv (albeit for a lot more money).  I think it cost around $100 but I was able to apply my Discover Card rewards so I only paid around $69 I believe.  Pros:  Small and portable; 12x zoom; nice still picks; nice looking camera and easy to use; affordable.  Cons:  Poor video and file format that can be a problem, depending on the devices your hooking it up to.

Reviews.Title: what's next
Reviews.Author: taoshum
Reviews.Content: takes nice pics.  It's very complex though.  this is my third "elph" camera and each time they make it better... the 12x zoom is really handy.

Reviews.Title: Awesome point & shoot camera!!
Reviews.Author: T. Vo "accoladephoto"
Reviews.Content: As a pro photographer, this is an amazing little p&s; camera!!  It works well for portraits, macros and zoomed shots at 12x zoom are great!  A little tough for zoomed, fast sports shots since the shutter has a little lag. Definitely get a case to keep dirt out of camera and learn to shut off flash when there's enough light.

Reviews.Title: Almost the perfect pocket sized digital camera.
Reviews.Author: Chad Brown
Reviews.Content: Very handy and feature packed camera.  Only two things I would like to improve is a stronger flash and additon of an optical view finder.  The screen display is sometimes difficult to see in the bright sunlight.

Reviews.Title: Delivers More Than Anticipated
Reviews.Author: Paul Hunter
Reviews.Content: I had to give this product the best rating available. I read reviews and consider the praise and the complaints before purchasing.  I found none of the complaints worthy of consideration after using the camera.  Reason:  Big camera for the price!  It is as simple as that.  I particularly love the HD video feature. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this Cannon camera for anyone shopping for this type of product.

Reviews.Title: New Camera
Reviews.Author: Rita Monk
Reviews.Content: We love this new camera.  We have a larger more complex camera as well but I wanted one that was real easy to use and I could stick in my purse.  It takes high quality pictures.  The only problem I can think of is that you have to press pretty hard on the button to snap the picture; so it is not good for the "weak fingered" LOL. Sometimes I miss the expression I wanted to capture just because it was delayed by my inability to press the button quickly enough.

Reviews.Title: Always ready to capture that moment
Reviews.Author: Annie
Reviews.Content: Perfect size for a take anywhere camera.  I am a digital SLR user but needed a camera for those moments that I did not take the big camera, or could not carry that much equipment around.  This is the best of the small camera in terms of great photos...I wanted the quality of the pix to be good enough that I was happy with them, and I am!

Reviews.Title: fast camera
Reviews.Author: slee
Reviews.Content: this is a nice small camera to carry around with. has good image and video quality it's worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Terrible Quality
Reviews.Author: Charles in Montreal
Reviews.Content: Ordered this camera for a trip.  It worked for a few shots and the lens got stuck and it stopped working entirely with electronics meltdown.  Quality of the build was extremely poor.  Unfortunately my last two experiences with Canon have been disappointing.

Reviews.Title: memory card not included
Reviews.Author: pup1618
Reviews.Content: I think it is better to tell customers that the memory card is not included,so customers can order memory card at the same time when they place an order.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Kathy
Reviews.Content: I use this in my work and use it every day.  It is easy to use and it is automatic for most functions.  Pretty fool proof.  The only thing I don't like is that I have not figured out how to override the automatic function and have the flash go off when the light meter thinks it doesn't need it.  It would be handy to have when something is back lit or there is a bright window, but the room still needs to be brightened up with the flash.  I actually have two of these that I carry every day.  If the battery gets low, I just grab the other camera.  Not that the battery needs recharging very often, but for me its simple to just carry two cameras.

Reviews.Title: Good for little hands
Reviews.Author: A. Psychiatrist
Reviews.Content: The tiny size of this camera and the buttons is nice for carrying, but clumsy at times for use. YOu need long nails to push the 'review' button which is flush with the camera top.The picture quality is good, below good SLR with good lenses, but showing details and good color reproduction, and fine for casual use. The compromise of fewer outside buttons with more functions hidden in menus is tiresome, but workable. I found graininess and poor focusing in lowlight conditions, and even lack of contrast and detail with flash.I tried to upload some pics for you, but the software wouldn't let me.  Works fine uploading to the computer, though.

Reviews.Title: Amazon bought
Reviews.Author: Dennis P. Laston
Reviews.Content: Replaced a lost one with the same. This camera met all my objectives.whats with these certain amount of words needed? That is stupid and NO more will I comment, hope your happy now!

Reviews.Title: ELPH POWER SHOT
Reviews.Author: ns
Reviews.Content: I PURCHASED THE ELPH POWER SHOT BECUSE OF ITS CONVENIENT SIZE AND HAVE ALWAYS BEEN EXTREMELY SATISFIED WITH MY CANON CAMERAS----I AM SURPRISED THAT THIS CAMERA IS MORE DIFFICULT TO USE RATHER THAN EASIER---IN AN EFFORT TO ELIMINATE BUTTONS ON THE CAMERA YOU NEED TO USE FEWER BUTTONS ---THIS IS NOT EASY TO DO CONSIDERING THE SIZE OF THE CAMERA----MY OLD CANON WAS MUCH EASIER TO USE ----

Reviews.Title: GOOD PRICE BUT CAME WITH NO CHARGER OR INSTRUCTIONS
Reviews.Author: A. Cathey
Reviews.Content: came labeled as new but came packaged with no instructions no charger no cd no laynyard but it did come with camera just not as described.

Reviews.Title: A nice little camera
Reviews.Author: heidi larson
Reviews.Content: Too soon to say much, but I like it quite a bit so far. I haven't had time to really explore video and sound as yet. One small problem is that software CD can't download so I must upgrade my OS X Leopard to Snow Leopard to download the manual to my MacBook,  but otherwise photos beautifully.  Also am a bit disappointed with the battery life.  Not at all as efficient a set up as on my older Canon PowerShot...it has only battery, with charger, but I will have to keep another handy as it didn't last long even when not in use for a week. Getting a suitable mini-card was another added price. When I called Canon and asked before purchase, they told me it used the same cards that I already use in my other camera.  Boo, Hiss!!!

Reviews.Title: Good be better
Reviews.Author: Mary Cotton
Reviews.Content: I would have rated this camera higher, but I don't like the Micro SD card--it is easy to lose. Also, the camera is slow to reset after you take a picture.

Reviews.Title: Great pics in a small package.
Reviews.Author: LORI
Reviews.Content: Great pics in a small package. I love this little camera. It has features that I havent even tried yet but am looking forward to exploring. Its a little boxy and the opening for the cable is kind of stiff but other than that I like how easy it is to use and carry around.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Dee
Reviews.Content: Love the size and the pictures were great.  I don't know what the other reviewers meant when they said the camera was loud; it sounds normal to me.

Reviews.Title: Sound quality
Reviews.Author: Fred Maragheh
Reviews.Content: The sound volume is low compared to kodak pocet camcorder even after I used the instruction to raise the volume.

Reviews.Title: nice little camera
Reviews.Author: Carol D. Gazzetta "shopgirl"
Reviews.Content: love the color and size, some of the photos came out great, only complaint, no book, you have to watch cd to learn how to use, not practial to me.  Once I learn how to use it fully I know I will love it!

Reviews.Title: Still playing
Reviews.Author: Judy K
Reviews.Content: Still playing with it...colors don't seem to be vivid in the pictures.  oom is really good.  The color of the camera is a really pretty wine color rather than a red.  Verdict is still out...

Reviews.Title: Should have spent a little more
Reviews.Author: Nate
Reviews.Content: First of all, the camera does take great pictures.  However, it's just not that easy to figure out all of the different settings.  I bought it for my wife because she wanted something that she could carry with her every day to take pictures of the kids.  This is perfect for that.  All we had before was my professional larger camera so this is great for everyday shots.  If you can afford to spend a little more money, go for the ELPH that is completely a touch screen.  From what I've read, it'll be easier to maneuver and the pictures will turn out just as good as this one.

Reviews.Title: Perfect...
Reviews.Author: Livia Perrier "Livia"
Reviews.Content: I didn't want to carry my very expensive cameras so requires this camera. Using this for my St. Maarten trip in Oct.

Reviews.Title: canon is the best
Reviews.Author: rishi lal
Reviews.Content: great small camera for day to day use .good battery life and sharp clear photos ..I can only say one negative things ..is that the battery charger is kinda big and hard to carry

Reviews.Title: Easy to use out of the box
Reviews.Author: Wendy
Reviews.Content: I like this camera.  It was very easy to use right away.  The facial recognition feature is kinda cool. The video quality is amazing for a such a small camera.  I love the size as it fits easily into the smallest of purses.  Does take a second or two to take the photo...not really a problem for me, but others may find it annoying.

Reviews.Title: Mother's Day Gift
Reviews.Author: Ovie L. Thomas
Reviews.Content: It was delevered in a timely fashion and it was well recieved by my wife. My only concern was that I revisited the site days later and the cameras were better megpixels and cheaper. Overall I was very happy with my purchase!

Reviews.Title: Very nice & useful small camera.
Reviews.Author: pK "science guy"
Reviews.Content: This is a great upgrade to my old Canon SD1000 subcompact camera, which I enjoyed except for its lack of Image Stabilization. This Elph 520 camera has not only Image Stabilization, but Optical zoom to 12x which really works WITH nice focus clarity!  Also, it's got nice movie modes in hi-def on tiny memory cards with lots of GB storage!  What an upgrade! And now I noticed a price drop to below $140.  It may not be an expensive SLR, but this is not a cheap camera, tech-wise, and it's very handy in the pocket and lots more functional pix/movie-wise than a smart phone.I've had this for one week now. No problems yet, and I don't anticipate any (my old SD1000 still works as it did 4 yrs ago).

Reviews.Title: So far so good!
Reviews.Author: Karla Nelson
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to have a pocket size camera to take on the go when it isn't convenient to use my DSLR.  Picture quality seems fine.  It's a little thicker than I would have liked but not terrible.  Love the blue color!

Reviews.Title: Canon makes an inexpensive 10' waterproof case for this camera ---
Reviews.Author: craigery
Reviews.Content: Canon makes a fairly inexpensive (around $55) waterproof case for this camera.  I don't believe Canon makes a waterproof case for other Elph models.  The clear waterproof case allows photography down to about 10 feet.  Not a diving camera obviously, but fun to take pictures in/around water.  I took some interesting shots with the lens halfway out and halfway in the water of our backyard pond!  The case aligns PERFECTLY with the camera buttons, and closes in seconds.  You can take the case skiing, wherever water intrusion into your camera might be a problem.As far as the camera goes, I have always had Canon digital cameras, and have never had a problem.  I have never had a zoom fail on me; never had a Canon camera break!  If the battery life isn't long enough for you, you can purchase 1000Ah 3.5v batteries for just a couple bucks (I believe the one that comes with the camera is 650amp hours).I keep a Canon digital camera in each of our two cars.  When I update my camera, the older camera goes into our older car.  So I never forget to bring along a camera!  Sometimes I haven't used the camera in months and months, but the battery has always remained charged!!  My older Canon digital cameras take perfectly great pics, but movie quality has improved in the past few years with newer Canon cameras.Anyway, highly recommended for versatility (availability of a manufacturer-made waterproof enclosure) and my experience over the years with Canon digital cameras!  ---

Reviews.Title: Canon Power Shot Elph 520
Reviews.Author: Birdman
Reviews.Content: Takes great photos and no problems yet.  It has several different settings and options and takes great videos for the price.

Reviews.Title: The camera stopped working after only 2 months for no obvious reason and I was refused a refund or an exchange
Reviews.Author: VV
Reviews.Content: Stopped working 2 months later for now obvious reason and they refused to refund the money back, because the time for returns was over according to the policy, but this should be in case the customer just "didn't like it" or "change their mind" for no reason, and NOT when the merchandise not working anymore after only 2 months.

Reviews.Title: Feels like a toy...
Reviews.Author: Michael W. Roberts "Mikey48"
Reviews.Content: But results are magnificent.  What a nice little camera. It really feels like and is a very light point&shoot; camera, weight wise.. It sort of feels like plastic, but I am sure it is quite durable and will last many good years.We replace my wife's camera every 3 to 4 years and she always asks for more zoo. Well this one has 12x optical zoom. Works great. Don't let light weight fool ya, this is a great picture taking machine. ;-) mike

Reviews.Title: Promising improvement
Reviews.Author: BigD
Reviews.Content: Replacing a lost Canon Elph (probably 10 years old), this has significant improvements but I haven't quite gotten the hang of it yet.  Some of the features seem confusing and counter-intuitive, but I'm not a techie gadget person so I expect it will be clearer with more use.  It is, however, absurd that Canon does not provide a case and that it must be ordered separately.

Reviews.Title: nice and good one!
Reviews.Author: Marce
Reviews.Content: very nice, cute, much better than my previous model. did not know that memory stick was a new smaller one until it was too late!

Reviews.Title: Poor Experience
Reviews.Author: William J Borgers
Reviews.Content: Worst Camera I ever bought.  It is unbelievable how complicated it is to get it operational. Never did get it to snap one picture.I want to get rid of it ASAP.

Reviews.Title: picture clarity is not good at all.need more improvement
Reviews.Author: Gargi Sen
Reviews.Content: picture clarity is not good at all.need more improvement.I did not like it much. looking for better version. :)

Reviews.Title: its ok...
Reviews.Author: ayawovi Badohoun
Reviews.Content: I love it.... I recommend to all... it easy to use.... very gentle and easy to hang. its like ....

Reviews.Title: Already has required service.
Reviews.Author: Peter Kaufman "PBK"
Reviews.Content: Camera has already required service once. Also, the 'manual controls' for things like aperture and shutter speed are limited. Can't recommend.

Reviews.Title: Good size to carry in pocket
Reviews.Author: WSK
Reviews.Content: So far so good.  Learning how to use it.  Hate it doesn't have a view finder as in bright sun you can't tell what you are taking a picture of.  But most lesser expensive cameras no longer have a view finder...yuck!

Reviews.Title: Very good pocket camera!
Reviews.Author: Review ""Could Be Happier customer!?""
Reviews.Content: Nice touch!settle well on your thumb!It very well make for a quick shoot camera!Can't decide white or black!  Huh.

Reviews.Title: help!
Reviews.Author: tony
Reviews.Content: How do you get the 58 effects on this camera? I dont know how to do it. I've been trying for so long. This camera is great though! Really confusing also

Reviews.Title: too much noise in low light.
Reviews.Author: H.W.Y.
Reviews.Content: decent picture quality in broad day light, but not indoors. In general, Image is simply not sharp enough. I had to return it.

Reviews.Title: Did not meet expectations :(
Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: This camera did not meet my expectations but it was a good price. Mainly, I am not pleased with shots with movement, they come out blurry. I do like the HD video option, however. The picture quality is OK but not great.

Reviews.Title: I Hate this Canon Power Elph
Reviews.Author: G. E. Martinez "anchorman"
Reviews.Content: I am on vacation in NM and this camera has ruined my vacation, the battery and charger are defective and will not hold a chargeor maybe it's the camera that is defective, as soon as I get back to California, I am going to return the whole thing back to Amazon,Please let me know, if you received this message.Thank You,Gil Martinez

Reviews.Title: new camera
Reviews.Author: Betty
Reviews.Content: I am still getting to know this new camera.  So far I have been very pleased with it's results and in time could move this to a 5 star.

Reviews.Title: I like the size and that is about it
Reviews.Author: Penny Donelan
Reviews.Content: The battery does not hold a charge.  The buttons are too small and don't always respond to touch.  It does not work when the temperatures drop (so much for ski pictures).  Have to allow a lot of time for the zoom to zoom and then it is usually too late to get the picture.  Unable to see anything in the LCD screen in the vertical position.  I like the LCD screen in the horizontal position and I like the size.  The pictures are fair to good but haven't had anything great yet.  It is not compatible with Picasa  and can't play the movies - very jerky.  Pretty much requires 2 hands to switch to movie mode.  The reason I bought the camera was for the movie mode feature and taking movies turned out to be the most disappointing thing about the camera.

Reviews.Title: Below average
Reviews.Author: LIn
Reviews.Content: Not happy with the picture quality.  Pictures seems to be out of focus and not well lit.  Maybe I'm just use to a 35mm. camera.

Reviews.Title: not the same quality as in the past
Reviews.Author: PMY
Reviews.Content: not the same quality as in the past.  The case is plastic & it take a micro chip.  I didn't even know there were micro chips.  I returned it.  Great seller though.

Reviews.Title: Very small in size and picture quality is just Ok
Reviews.Author: reshma
Reviews.Content: its good camera for the price,and for a user who just needs to capture the pix,  without expecting much quality /clarity

Reviews.Title: Too small
Reviews.Author: Shirley Armstrong
Reviews.Content: .The camera was smaller than appeared in the advertisement.Buttons were tiny and wrong ones easily pushed.Directions difficult to understand.

Reviews.Title: I REALLY wanted to love this camera
Reviews.Author: Sherrie Turner
Reviews.Content: I had high hopes when I received the camera. I printed and read the manual with the camera in my hand going through everything.Immediately had issues with the image stabilization. I re-read the manual and googled the issue trying to find out what I was doing wrong. Came to realization that it wasn't me, it's the camera. Luckily it is within the return window so hopefully there won't be any issues on receiving a refund.A replacement wasn't offered. Not sure I would want one, a little leary of the the model now.

Reviews.Title: It was a nice size for slipping into a pocket or purse, but the battery situation was not suitable.
Reviews.Author: steve allyn
Reviews.Content: It didn't have some of the features I was looking for.  I like to have batteries that are easily replaced, not one that has to be recharged.  I also like to be able to store the battery in the camera when not in use.  The battery for this camera needed to be removed when not in use.

Reviews.Title: Super little camera - "little" being the operative word!
Reviews.Author: Helen Ferguson
Reviews.Content: I have had a number of small cameras, mostly Canon, (I always carry a little digital in my purse, especially since I am a grandmother!) and I wore out my last one. I was delighted to find this one at such a good price. I have only had this one for a short while, but so far it has lived up to my expectations, although I'm only an amateur photographer. I would certainly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera ! !
Reviews.Author: t49y
Reviews.Content: Once The Flash Got Turned Off ! Easy ! When Camera Is On ! Push The Right Little Thunder Bolt Button ! Quickly Push Again When That Thunder Bolt Reaches The Center Of The Screen ! Catch It ! It'll Jump Right Back ! Now You Can Really Use It ! Pictures Of Pictures ! All Fun ! This Camera Is A Ball ! Still Learning ! New Stuff All The Time ! Love Fest ! What's Not To Love ! All Before Getting Outside ! Where It Really Shines ! The Old Asahi Pentax ! 1969 ! State Of Art ! The Moon Walk ! Awesome ! Way Awesome ! But Was Never Like This ! NO FILM ! The Wolf Bane Of All ! All That Going ! All That Money ! All That Grief ! Gone ! Functional As Well As So Tiny ! So Cute ! Put This Labor(And Money) Saving Baby In It's Own Case ! By It Self ! Then Pocket Or Purse ! Cost Way Less ! All Auto ! Just Take The Picture ! Awesome Christmas Gift(Stocking Stuffer) ! Or Any Time ! Thanks Amazon ! Got One !

Reviews.Title: Okay camera
Reviews.Author: D. G
Reviews.Content: My wife asked for a new Canon to replace the one she loved, but had been damaged.After checking the reviews we selected this one.The camera arrived and was given a quick evaluation. My wife decided to return it due to1- weight2- size slightly bulkier than the previous Canon3 Pictures were not any betterWe bought a Cannon S100 which she loves and was cheaper!

Reviews.Title: Can't download videos to Picassa.
Reviews.Author: Alan
Reviews.Content: The battery door on my great PowerShot SD300 Digital Elph broke so I bought the 520HS. I use the camera to take pictures and videos for my Rotary Club  and use it for personal use like everyone else.I am not able to download the videos to Picassa. This is where I make any modifications and put them in web albums, etc. I then put the videos on my Rotary Club's website or in personal web albums. I have never had a problem with the other camera. With this camera you can use the supplied interface cable or as suggested by the Canon representative via a rapid-response email (which I commend) put the micro memory card in an Adapter and then download the videos to  a memory card reader  to my computer. Well that didn't work either. It will download to Canon's software but that doesn't help me. I was wondering if anyone else has had this problem? I did not read any customer reviews regarding downloading the videos.Also, when you view and listen to the video on the camera the speaker is in the front of the camera and you have to put your ear to the front of the camera to hear anything. - No I don't have a hearing problem, and I did turn the volume up but I really don't think that control increases the volume much if any. Why would they put the speaker on the front of the camera while you are looking at the video on the back of the camera? It doesn't make sense.Before I bought the camera I did read the  customer reviews on Amazon (Amazon did have the best price) and knew to buy a Micro memory card.So has anyone had the same problem I have with downloading videos to Picassa?I can't be the only one.Is the internal video formatting different than  in the older but dependable (except for the broken door which prevents the camera from being operated) camera? If I can't download to Picassa this camera is nice looking  but is totally useless for transferring videos! - Help

Reviews.Title: I sent this back.
Reviews.Author: Amy Royal
Reviews.Content: this camera is totally out of date.  I have Windows 8 and the camera does not work without jumping through hoops to download pics.

Reviews.Title: No memory card, no camera
Reviews.Author: F. Hunter "Music Lover"
Reviews.Content: I really cannot rate this camera precisely, because none of the memory cards worked for this particular camera.  This camera cannot function without a memory card.

Reviews.Title: Good product, but...
Reviews.Author: Roberto G. Travaglini
Reviews.Content: I received the product and seemed to be a very good product. But the problem is that it does not come with the memory card and in any place figures the model of the memory. So I've got the product, but I can't use it because I don't have the memory and I don't know which to buy...
